name: Comfy Deploy
headline: Vercel for Gen AI applications
description:
Comfy Deploy lets developers build and deploy workflows that use Stable Diffusion and other models to produce images and video. Instead of cobbling together fragmented tools, teams now build workflows that generate assets they need on their own.

**Team ComfyUI workspace**

• Replacing cobbled-together solutions with a unified, team-focused environment without the pain of self-hosting.

• Eliminate "works on my machine" issues with version control.

• Share storage for models and outputs.

• Leverage the power of ComfyUI without the complexities of self-hosting

**Powerful GPU Infrastructure**
• Access managed GPUs that grow with your teams needs

• Tailor the platform to your requirements by easily installing custom nodes and models

**Custom configuration**

• Download the models you want, stored privately in your personal volume

• Install the custom nodes your workflow needs

• Train models on your own datasets.

**API Deployments: From workflow to production in seconds**

• Transform any workflow into a fully functional API immediately without extra engineering

• Comprehensive observability on every run

• Built-in API authentication

• TS/JS/Python/Ruby SDKs for seamless integration

founders.name: Benny Kok, Founder
founders.description: Building ComfyDeploy, a platform empowering teams to deploy custom AI workflows using ComfyUI. With a background in music, game development, and programming, he's passionate about making advanced AI tools accessible to non-technical users, revolutionizing how teams interact with AI in creative processes.

# Run and deploy your ComfyUI workflows
## Production-ready APIs for your ComfyUI workflows. Helping teams collaborate, and deploy AI applications faster.
![Y Combinator](https://comfydeploy.com/yc-backed.svg)
[Book a demo](https://comfydeploy.com/</workflows>)[Docs](https://comfydeploy.com/<https:/docs.comfydeploy.com/introduction>)
Your browser does not support the video tag.
Customers using Comfy Deploy
# Made for teams using ComfyUI
## From your ComfyUI Artist to production.
Collaborative Workspace
Collaborative Workspace
One Click API Deployment
One Click API Deployment
Powerful Managed GPUs
Powerful Managed GPUs
Any Models, Any Custom Nodes
Any Models, Any Custom Nodes
Observability
Observability
# 
Edit and share workflows across your team with version control.One workspace for the whole team, stop wasting time on configuration.
![One Click API Deployment](https://comfydeploy.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcd-misc.s3.us-east-2.amazonaws.com%2Flanding%2FCleanShot%2B2024-07-20%2Bat%2B18.34.04%25402x.png&w=3840&q=75)
![One Click API Deployment](https://comfydeploy.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcd-misc.s3.us-east-2.amazonaws.com%2Flanding%2FCleanShot%2B2024-07-20%2Bat%2B18.34.04%25402x.png&w=3840&q=75)![One Click API Deployment](https://comfydeploy.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcd-misc.s3.us-east-2.amazonaws.com%2Flanding%2FCleanShot%2B2024-07-20%2Bat%2B18.34.04%25402x.png&w=3840&q=75)![One Click API Deployment](https://comfydeploy.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcd-misc.s3.us-east-2.amazonaws.com%2Flanding%2FCleanShot%2B2024-07-20%2Bat%2B18.34.04%25402x.png&w=3840&q=75)
## Collaborative Workspace
Edit and share workflows across your team with version control. Configure your workspace once and it will work everywhere
![One Click API Deployment](https://comfydeploy.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcd-misc.s3.us-east-2.amazonaws.com%2Flanding%2FCleanShot%2B2024-07-20%2Bat%2B17.38.39%25402x.png&w=1920&q=75)
```
const result = await comfyDeploy.run.create({
 deploymentId: "xxx-xxx-xxxx",
 inputs: {
  "positive_prompt": "beautiful scenery...",
 },
 webhook: "https://example.com/webhook",
});
```
Copy
## One Click API Deployment
Turn any ComfyUI workflows into scalable APIs instantly. Deploy to staging / prod, integrate into your apps with TS/Python/Ruby SDKs.
A100
A10G
H100
## Powerful Managed GPUs
Utilize managed GPUs without hardware constraints that grow with your needs. Scale your processing power effortlessly as your projects expand.
![One Click API Deployment](https://comfydeploy.com/_next/image?url=%2Flanding%2Fupload.png&w=3840&q=75)
## Any Models, Any Custom Nodes
Install any loras, safetensors via our cloud storage without any bandwidth issues. All the custom nodes from ComfyUI Manager are supported.
![One Click API Deployment](https://comfydeploy.com/_next/image?url=%2Flanding%2Fobservability.png&w=3840&q=75)![One Click API Deployment](https://comfydeploy.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcd-misc.s3.us-east-2.amazonaws.com%2Flanding%2FCleanShot%2B2024-07-20%2Bat%2B22.04.18%25402x.png&w=1920&q=75)
## Observability
Enjoy the robust capabilities of ComfyUI without the hassle of self-hosting. Experience a seamless and intuitive platform that simplifies complex processes.
# Testimonials
## Over 100 product teams building with Comfy Deploy
Production time is now up to 300% faster. Producing a complete character pack for Mighty Action Heroes used to take 6 man-weeks. It now takes 1.5 man-week. Comfy Deploy has been critical to achieve this kind of success, as a large number of our custom pipelines are built with ComfyUI.
- Ben ChevalierChief AI officer @ Mighty Bear Games
ComfyDeploy has laid a lot of the groundwork for us, allowing us to move quickly and save on our engineering budget which is crucial in our fast-paced environment. 10/10, I would highly recommend it.
- JavidCEO @ Secret desires
Comfy Deploy comes in and addresses the main barrier to using ComfyUI while also taking it a step further and allowing us to deploy our unique ComfyUI workflows.
- EApplied AI engineer @ Stealth
Workflows served
    6,630
Total workflow runs
    10,052,169
Models installed
    24,611
Comfy Deploy
Been fixing custom nodes installation issues since ComfyUI came out.

  * [Automatic Inpainting API](https://comfydeploy.com/<https:/www.comfydeploy.com/share/comfy-deploy-example-automatic-inpainting-clip-seg>)


### Support

generated_description:
**Comfy Deploy: Simplifying AI Workflow Deployment**

Founded in 2024 and emerging from Y Combinator's Batch S24, Comfy Deploy is making waves in the AI application landscape. Imagine a world where you can smoothly build, deploy, and manage workflows for generative AI—Comfy Deploy is here to make that a reality, akin to what Vercel has accomplished for front-end development.

**The Mission**
The mission of Comfy Deploy is to provide developers with a cohesive platform akin to Vercel, but specifically tailored for generative AI applications. Initially, the focus was on workflows using Stable Diffusion and other models to create rich media like images and videos. The philosophy? Why juggle disparate tools when you can construct integrated workflows that cater to your asset generation needs?

**Key Features**

1. **Team-Centric Workspace:** 
   - Bid farewell to "works on my machine" confusion with built-in version control.
   - Share models and outputs effortlessly, fostering collaboration.
   - No need for self-hosting complexities; everything operates smoothly from a unified workspace.

2. **Robust GPU Infrastructure:**
   - Scale GPU resources as your team grows, ensuring you never hit a hardware ceiling.
   - Easily customize your platform with the models and nodes that suit your workflows.

3. **Custom Configuration:** 
   - Download models and store them privately, plus install nodes tailored to your project requirements.
   - Train models using your datasets for precision.

4. **Rapid API Deployments:** 
   - Transform any workflow into a functional API in seconds without the need for extensive engineering.
   - Enjoy real-time observability and built-in API authentication, with support for popular SDKs like TypeScript, JavaScript, Python, and Ruby.

**Current Collaborations and Impact**
With a nimble team based in San Francisco, Comfy Deploy is leveraging its technology for more than 100 teams. Users have reported up to 300% increases in production efficiency; a character pack that once took six man-weeks can now be completed in just 1.5 weeks. That’s not just an improvement; it’s a game-changer in project timelines.

**Testimonials from the Frontline**
- Ben Chevalier, Chief AI Officer at Mighty Bear Games, praises the platform for trimming project turnaround drastically.
- Javid, CEO of Secret Desires, appreciates the speed it brings while being budget-friendly.
- A representative from Stealth highlights the ease of deployment for unique workflows.

**Let's Wrap It Up**
Comfy Deploy is not just a tool; it’s a platform that empowers teams to leverage AI without getting tangled in the complexities of deployment. The future of collaborative AI-driven development is here, ready to supercharge your projects. For those interested in exploring their offerings further, check out their website: [Comfy Deploy](https://comfydeploy.com).

In short, if you're in the AI space and tired of fiddling with fragmented solutions, it's time to explore the comfy side of deployment.
